mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_refund ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, reviewed_date, completed_date, state, type, visa_id, commission_order_id, user_id, applicant_id, adviser_id, mara_id, official_id, school_id, course_id, receive_date, received, amount, payment_voucher_image_url, payment_voucher_image_url_2, payment_voucher_image_url_3, payment_voucher_image_url_4, payment_voucher_image_url_5, refund_voucher_image_url, refund_detail_id, refund_detail, currency_type, exchange_rate, account_name, bank_name, bsb, rmb_remarks, reason, remarks, note) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{reviewedDate}, #{completedDate}, 'PENDING', #{type}, #{visaId}, #{commissionOrderId}, #{userId}, #{applicantId}, #{adviserId}, #{maraId}, #{officialId}, #{schoolId}, #{courseId}, #{receiveDate}, #{received}, #{amount}, #{paymentVoucherImageUrl}, #{paymentVoucherImageUrl2}, #{paymentVoucherImageUrl3}, #{paymentVoucherImageUrl4}, #{paymentVoucherImageUrl5}, #{refundVoucherImageUrl}, #{refundDetailId}, #{refundDetail}, #{currencyType}, #{exchangeRate}, #{accountName}, #{bankName}, #{bsb}, #{rmbRemarks}, #{reason}, #{remarks}, #{note});
mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.gmt_create AS gmtCreate, r.gmt_modify AS gmtModify, r.reviewed_date AS reviewedDate, r.completed_date AS completedDate, r.state, r.type, r.visa_id AS visaId, r.commission_order_id AS commissionOrderId, r.user_id AS userId, r.applicant_id AS applicantId, u.name AS userName, r.adviser_id AS adviserId, a.name AS adviserName, re.name AS adviserRegionName, r.mara_id AS maraId, r.official_id AS officialId, o.name AS officialName, r.school_id AS schoolId, r.course_id AS courseId, r.receive_date AS receiveDate, r.received, r.amount, r.payment_voucher_image_url AS paymentVoucherImageUrl, r.payment_voucher_image_url_2 AS paymentVoucherImageUrl2, r.payment_voucher_image_url_3 AS paymentVoucherImageUrl3, r.payment_voucher_image_url_4 AS paymentVoucherImageUrl4, r.payment_voucher_image_url_5 AS paymentVoucherImageUrl5, r.refund_voucher_image_url AS refundVoucherImageUrl, r.refund_detail_id AS refundDetailId, r.refund_detail AS refundDetail, r.currency_type AS currencyType, r.exchange_rate AS exchangeRate, r.account_name AS accountName, r.bank_name AS bankName, r.bsb, r.rmb_remarks AS rmbRemarks, r.reason AS reason, r.remarks, r.note FROM tb_user u, tb_adviser a, tb_region re, b_refund r left join b_official o ON r.official_id = o.id WHERE r.user_id = u.id AND r.adviser_id = a.id AND re.id = a.region_id AND r.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};

SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, gmt_modify AS gmtModify, reviewed_date AS reviewedDate, completed_date AS completedDate, state, type, visa_id AS visaId, commission_order_id AS commissionOrderId, user_id AS userId, applicant_id AS applicantId, adviser_id AS adviserId, mara_id AS maraId, official_id AS officialId, school_id AS schoolId, course_id AS courseId, receive_date AS receiveDate, received, amount, payment_voucher_image_url AS paymentVoucherImageUrl, payment_voucher_image_url_2 AS paymentVoucherImageUrl2, payment_voucher_image_url_3 AS paymentVoucherImageUrl3, payment_voucher_image_url_4 AS paymentVoucherImageUrl4, payment_voucher_image_url_5 AS paymentVoucherImageUrl5, refund_voucher_image_url AS refundVoucherImageUrl, refund_detail_id AS refundDetailId, refund_detail AS refundDetail, currency_type AS currencyType, exchange_rate AS exchangeRate, account_name AS accountName, bank_name AS bankName, bsb, rmb_remarks AS rmbRemarks, reason AS reason, remarks, note FROM b_refund WHERE state != 'CLOSE' AND commission_order_id = #{commissionOrderId, jdbcType=INTEGER};

SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, gmt_modify AS gmtModify, reviewed_date AS reviewedDate, completed_date AS completedDate, state, type, visa_id AS visaId, commission_order_id AS commissionOrderId, user_id AS userId, applicant_id AS applicantId, adviser_id AS adviserId, mara_id AS maraId, official_id AS officialId, school_id AS schoolId, course_id AS courseId, receive_date AS receiveDate, received, amount, payment_voucher_image_url AS paymentVoucherImageUrl, payment_voucher_image_url_2 AS paymentVoucherImageUrl2, payment_voucher_image_url_3 AS paymentVoucherImageUrl3, payment_voucher_image_url_4 AS paymentVoucherImageUrl4, payment_voucher_image_url_5 AS paymentVoucherImageUrl5, refund_voucher_image_url AS refundVoucherImageUrl, refund_detail_id AS refundDetailId, refund_detail AS refundDetail, currency_type AS currencyType, -- exchange_rate AS exchangeRate, account_name AS accountName, bank_name AS bankName, bsb, rmb_remarks AS rmbRemarks, reason AS reason, remarks, note FROM b_refund WHERE state != 'CLOSE' AND visa_id = #{visaId, jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM b_refund WHERE id =#{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.select:
SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(rf.gmt_create, '%Y-%m') AS date,
DATE_FORMAT(rf.gmt_create, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date,
DATE_FORMAT(rf.gmt_create, '%Y-%m') AS date,
DATE_FORMAT(rf.gmt_create, '%Y') AS date,
DATE_FORMAT(rf.gmt_create, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date,
r.id AS regionId, r.name AS area, a.id AS adviserId, a.name AS consultant, SUM(IF(rf.state = 'COMPLETE', IFNULL(IFNULL(IF(rf.currency_type='CNY',rf.amount/(SELECT znz_exchange_rate FROM b_everyday_exchange_rate ORDER BY gmt_create DESC LIMIT 1),rf.amount), 0.00) , 0.00), 0.00)) AS refunding, SUM(IF(rf.state = 'PAID', IFNULL(IFNULL(IF(rf.currency_type='CNY',rf.amount/(SELECT znz_exchange_rate FROM b_everyday_exchange_rate ORDER BY gmt_create DESC LIMIT 1),rf.amount), 0.00) , 0.00), 0.00)) AS refunded FROM b_refund rf, tb_adviser a, tb_region r WHERE a.region_id = r.id AND rf.adviser_id = a.id AND rf.state IN ('REVIEW', 'COMPLETE', 'PAID', 'CLOSE')
AND rf.gmt_create > #{startDate} AND rf.gmt_create < #{endDate}
AND r.id = #{regionId}
AND a.id = #{adviserId}
AND a.id IN
#{aid}
GROUP BY
DATE_FORMAT(rf.gmt_create, '%Y-%m'),
DATE_FORMAT(rf.gmt_create, '%Y-%m-%d'),
DATE_FORMAT(rf.gmt_create, '%Y-%m'),
DATE_FORMAT(rf.gmt_create, '%Y'),
DATE_FORMAT(rf.gmt_create, '%Y-%m-%d'),
adviser_id ORDER BY rf.gmt_create DESC;

SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(rf.completed_date, '%Y-%m') AS date,
DATE_FORMAT(rf.completed_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date,
DATE_FORMAT(rf.completed_date, '%Y-%m') AS date,
DATE_FORMAT(rf.completed_date, '%Y') AS date,
DATE_FORMAT(rf.completed_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date,
r.id AS regionId, r.name AS area, a.id AS adviserId, a.name AS consultant, SUM(IF(rf.state = 'COMPLETE', IFNULL(IFNULL(IF(rf.currency_type='CNY',rf.amount/(SELECT znz_exchange_rate FROM b_everyday_exchange_rate ORDER BY gmt_create DESC LIMIT 1),rf.amount), 0.00) , 0.00), 0.00)) AS refunding, SUM(IF(rf.state = 'PAID', IFNULL(IFNULL(IF(rf.currency_type='CNY',rf.amount/(SELECT znz_exchange_rate FROM b_everyday_exchange_rate ORDER BY gmt_create DESC LIMIT 1),rf.amount), 0.00) , 0.00), 0.00)) AS refunded FROM b_refund rf, tb_adviser a, tb_region r WHERE a.region_id = r.id AND rf.adviser_id = a.id AND rf.state IN ('REVIEW', 'COMPLETE', 'PAID', 'CLOSE') AND rf.visa_id IS NULL AND rf.visa_id IS NOT NULL AND rf.commission_order_id IS NOT NULL
AND rf.completed_date > #{startDate} AND rf.completed_date < #{endDate}
AND r.id = #{regionId}
AND a.id = #{adviserId}
AND a.id IN
#{aid}
GROUP BY
DATE_FORMAT(rf.completed_date, '%Y-%m'),
DATE_FORMAT(rf.completed_date, '%Y-%m-%d'),
DATE_FORMAT(rf.completed_date, '%Y-%m'),
DATE_FORMAT(rf.completed_date, '%Y'),
DATE_FORMAT(rf.completed_date, '%Y-%m-%d'),
adviser_id ORDER BY rf.gmt_create DESC;
